biotools.summary:
Harnessing the Power of Guiding Potentials to Sample RNA Landscapes.

RNAxplorer is a multitool, that offers different methods to explore RNA energy landscapes. The main use case is sampling of representative structures of the RNA conformation space, in order to compute RNA folding kinetics.

bioschemas.name: RNAxplorer
